uvi.description:
blk-cgroup: fix UAF by grabbing blkcg lock before destroying blkg pd

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.70 by commit f58d305887ad7b24986d58e881f6806bb81b2bdf. For more details please see the references link.
